thread.title: Ranveer Singh Spills All His Teenage Secrets On "Unplugged With Hanee Chavan"
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh Spills All His Teenage Secrets On "Unplugged With Hanee Chavan"

title: Ranveer Singh Spills All His Teenage Secrets On "Unplugged With Hanee Chavan"
text:
facebook 495 SHARES 
Hanee Chavan, all of 17 years, is one of the latest Indian YouTube sensations who has managed to get some of the biggest names in the entertainment industry on her chat show. From Malaika Arora Khan to Karan Kundra and Anusha Dandekar, to Sonam Kapoor and Sunny Leone, she's got all the biggest stars to spill their secrets and have a great time. And her latest guest is, none other than our favourite Bollywood heartthrob, Ranveer Singh. Hanee got Ranveer to spill all his teenage secrets, from anger management issues to his first kiss at the age of 12, his affinity for flirtations with good-looking women, and a campaign in Seventeen magazine. The two even played a fun game in the end, attempting to hum songs for other to guess, with marshmallows in their mouth. Watch Ranveer at his candid best in the video, here.
